settings.text_2: Subscribe today and get ready to experience a new way of mindful relaxation! Each month get all you need for a whole new project in a single box! All tools included.
Sit back, relax and let us curate your first box! Every month you'll find: a soft canvas, plenty of sparkly diamonds, sturdy and comfortable application tools, high-quality wax.
Dedicate time to yourself and get ready to unwind with a new relaxing hobby, build a new mindful habit by making art, wave boredom goodbye with new DIY projects every month.

settings.title: WHAT'S IN OUR BOXES?
settings.heading: WHAT'S IN OUR BOXES?
settings.sub_title:
Each months Made of Diamonds Box
is a unique surprise!

settings.text_2: Our team is ready to answer all your questions!
settings.text_3:
• 24/7 Customer Support

  • Easy & Free Returns

  • 100% Satisfaction

settings.deal_desc: Introducing Made of Diamonds Box - a monthly subscription service, delivered right at your doorstep each month, to assist in encouraging you to dive deeper into the fascinating world of Diamond art.

settings.text_2: Every new painting will encourage you to dive deeper into the fascinating world of art and get acquainted with your tender & dreamy inner self you've been hiding for so long!
Diamond art is more than just beautiful. It's the perfect way to introduce a new healthy habit into your routine. Discover a new way to unwind that will help you feel calm & recharged.

settings.text_1: Get Closer With Your Loved Ones
settings.text_2: Build stronger bonds with your loved ones! Have fun by discovering a mindful hobby together and connecting with your family or friends, no matter how busy your day's been.

settings.name: Jenny B.
settings.quote:

-Jenny B.

settings.name: Kiara S.
settings.quote:
"This was my first diamond painting and we did it together with my daughter. It was the best quality time ever! Waiting for my next box! "

-Kiara S.

settings.name: Katie G.
settings.quote:
"A pretty canvas with pretty colors and very easy to read the symbols. Even more beautiful than I thought. My favorite hobby, which gives me a smile."

-Katie G.

settings.name: Susan V.
settings.quote:
"After a busy day, this helps me to relax and refocus. The painting was really beautiful, adhesive was sticky and diamonds shiny! Loved it!"

-Susan V.

settings.name: Jennifer C.
settings.quote:
"Getting the Made of Diamonds subscription is my favorite part of the month! Shiny diamonds and smooth canvas - I love every single detail of my monthly packages."

-Jennifer C.

settings.text_1:
Made of Diamonds was designed with the idea to inspire and entice the creative side of people around the world. 
We wished to create a relaxing hobby that will fulfill both your 'me time' and time spent with your loved ones, especially those little ones. So, we decided - why not create something better? Why not do something we enjoy as well as help others have fun and create real beauty? And this is how Made of Diamonds was born!
